long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the ultimate currency conversion app for all your travel needs! With our offline capability, you can convert currencies without an internet connection. Our four fields for other currencies make it easy to compare rates, while our favorites feature allows for fast selection of frequently used currencies. Plus, our app is completely free and does not collect any user data. Available on both Google Play and the App Store, this multiplatform app is the perfect companion for your next trip abroad.
